features.name: Online Banking
features.content: Our modern web and mobile applications to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

features.name: Simple Budgeting
features.content: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when your`re close to hitting your limits.

features.name: Fast Onboarding
features.content: We don`t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

features.name: Open API
features.content: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one accounts. Tracking your money has never been easier.
